verses.name: Mark 1:19
verses.text: And when he had gone a little further thence, he saw James the son of Zebedee, and John his brother, who also were in the ship mending their nets.

verses.name: Mark 1:20
verses.text: And straightway he called them: and they left their father Zebedee in the ship with the hired servants, and went after him.

verses.name: Mark 1:21
verses.text: And they went into Capernaum; and straightway on the sabbath day he entered into the synagogue, and taught.

verses.name: Mark 1:22
verses.text: And they were astonished at his doctrine: for he taught them as one that had authority, and not as the scribes.
